description:
Hello ladies... Look at your phone. Now back to me.  Now back at your phone.  Now back to me.  Sadly, I'm not on your phone, but I could be!  Tap the download button and you can take me everywhere you want me to be.

New in version 1.0.3:
+ Mr. Ray Lewis has joined us aboard the S.S. Awesome with 7 of his incredibly inspirational clips!
+ Added a p-p-p-powerful sound clip from Mr. Terry Crews!
+ Fixed a bug that would cause MediaServer to crash.

New in version 1.0.2:
+ Mr. Terry Crews has joined us aboard the S.S. Awesome with 6 of his stunningly powerful clips!
+ New icon and backgrounds!
+ Added a small ad banner to help cover development costs

Send comments & feedback to:
support@flamingdrumstick.com
